name: Special Topics in Health Humanities
description: An examination of a current topic in Health Humanities. The specific topic will vary from year to year.
department: Interdisciplinary Centre for Health and Society (UTSC)
prerequisites: HLTB50H3 with a minimum grade of 70%; an additional 1.5 credits at the C-level in HLT courses from the program requirements from one of the Major/Major Co-op programs in Health Studies.
